steps.name: Given  user is at login page
When  user is logging-in with sehajpreet2.nicholi@orperfect.com hqqps2J$
Then  he should be redirected to the home page
When  he selects Ampoule Vecteur Incandescent
And  he fills in the quantity of the product to add via icons - and +
And  he clicks on add to cart
And  he clicks on cart icon
And  User clicks on order button
And  User fills fields with 4242 4242 4242 4242, 12 / 23, 520 and 204 Rue Manga-bell
Then  A validation confirmation message should appear on the screen
